content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. As you know, I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: What is your initial offer for the rental price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm looking for at least 1500 Euros a month. I'm sure you understand that I want to get the best price for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's quite expensive. I'm a student and I'm looking for something more affordable. How about 800 Euros?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 800 Euros is far too low for my apartment. I can go down to 1200 Euros, but that's the lowest I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still quite high for me. How about 900 Euros? I can show you the contracts that I have for my student loans and part-time jobs to prove that I can afford this.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but 900 Euros is still too low for me. I appreciate your willingness to show proof of your income, but I'm not willing to go lower than 1200 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. However, I'm a responsible and dependable student. I can pay 1000 Euros a month, which is a fair price for an unfurnished apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, but 1000 Euros is still too low for me. I'm sorry, but I'm not willing to go lower than 1200 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think we have a deal. I agree to the price of 1200 Euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [1200] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Abbasi. The apartment will be available for you to move in from the 1st of next month. If you have any issues, please let me know.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I look forward to moving in. If there are any issues, I will be sure to let you know. 'TERMINATE'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
